title: Items cannot be selected at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item.

Observed Behavior (OB): When trying to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of allowing the item to be selected.

Expected Behavior (EB): When selecting an item in the library outline view, it should be possible to do so without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce (SR): 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Try to select an item.
